website_summaries.verdict: A great small option for a LaCie external hard drive with rugged construction.
pros: Weather and drop/crush resistance makes this hard drive perfect for travel or for use outdoors
Comes with a dedicated soft case for even more protection
cons: Thunderbolt/USB-C connection does not deliver the advertised high speeds

customer_reviews.title: DON'T RELY ON THIS HARD DRIVE. DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Works great just for two months, Don't buy it, already having issues with this hard drive within three months. Crashing when try to open my files. Sometimes my iMac having issues to see the hard drive. Don t rely on the this product.
customer_reviews.author: TemiDaniel

customer_reviews.title: This is the best hard drive has ever owned
customer_reviews.text: USB – C 5 TB LaCie rugged I am currently waiting on the 4 TB version as I have already filled the 5 TB with films (3.9 TB) and TV (900 GB). If you have a USB – C capable computer, Like the MacBook Pro 2017 with 500 GB solid-state drive... Prepare yourself to be amazed. I can transfer 60 GB seasons of shows From the hard drive of the Mac to LaCie rugged in 5 mins. You are not getting one gigabyte per second but you are getting extremely fast speeds There are no substitutes for the LaCie rugged line.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Drive is solid, cable not so much.
customer_reviews.text: So I'm a photographer who spends a lot of time on the road and in rough areas. I picked this up before a trip to the southwest as I wanted something a little rugged. As for the drive itself, it works perfectly. Its taken a few small drops and still works good. The case thats included is great and an easy way to keep the drive and cable together. The port on the drive however has already almost failed the cable barely stays in with the plastic cover on the drive, without it the cable still slips out every once and a while. Kind of disappointed by that as I had high hopes for this drive.
customer_reviews.author: lostinintrospection

customer_reviews.title: PC and Mac compatible!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hard drive because it's both PC and Mac compatible so I can use it at home and on my schools computers. Extremely easy set up and very very good hard drive. These things are indestrucable, soundless, fast and sleek. The case that came with it is pretty awesome too. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: ... these rugged drives and they are hands down the best drives for Audio and video when you are moving ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these ones but have boughten over 20 of these rugged drives and they are hands down the best drives for Audio and video when you are moving around. I have not had one of these drives crash in over 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: DJ BOOTLEG

customer_reviews.title: Using for Time Machine backups
customer_reviews.text: Wanted Thunderbolt for a Time Machine drive and rugged sounded good too. I can drop it from five feet up if it is not running so I feel confident about my backup being safe. I have another drive that uses USB3 and T-bolt is a lot faster, plus the T-bolt cable is built in and stows in the orange foam surrounding the edges of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: AlanaDeanTop Contributor: Classical Music

customer_reviews.title: DOA out of box,
customer_reviews.text: Just took drive out of box to use for the first time. (Outside of return window for Amazon). Bought 2Tb drive and it only shows 400Mb available. Even then, it won't let me add more than a few photo's before it says the disk is full. Waste of money, Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D & D

customer_reviews.title: USB-C cable ejects drive randomly
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this drive for what it is, I needed a rugged drive that could stand being on the go. The only issue that I have with it, is that the USB-C cable that it comes with makes the drive eject randomly. I do not have that issue when using the USB 3.0 cable and a USB-C adapter. For that reason, I am giving it 3 stars because if it ejects when a file is being written, it can corrupt the entire drive.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: The best hard drive I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: I got this hard drive after my Seagate one failed, and its worth every penny. The 4TB hard drive is super reliable and fits a ton of stuff. I back up my laptop and all my important files on it. The case also adds an extra layer of security to the product. Make sure to still eject the hard drive safely or it could fail.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: BELIEVE WHAT YOU READ - VERY SLOW!  DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a min. 2T hard drive, I spent over an hour reading reviews. I bought a 2T Lacie thunderbolt about a year ago and love it, so when I saw this one, while not thunderbolt, I decided to go for it. I read the reviews saying it was slow, but wondered "how slow could it be? It can't be THAT bad". No, it's worse! This is the slowest drive ever!!! Spend the extra money and get the thunderbolt! Remember my saying: "Hindsight was really foresight, you just chose to ignore it."
customer_reviews.author: Often Amazon Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: this stupid hard drive keeps disconnecting and reconnecting by itself
customer_reviews.text: This hard drive did not last long. 8 months later though treated and cared for impeccably, this stupid hard drive keeps disconnecting and reconnecting by itself. I will just be opening a file only to have the whole folder close and then reopen because of this hard drive. I would appreciate a refund, but I cannot find any intuitive way to contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far best drive I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to avoid buying Lacie for a few years because of the added expense. Ive instead bought WD and Seagate's. I've had numerous Seagates and WDs go bad on me, moreso the WDs rather than the Seagates. This time was the last though. This drive is FAST. it's smooth. It holds all ms stuff and because of the rubber padding on the outside, I feel like it's less fragile, even if that's only a gimmick. I will never buy WD again and probably never Seagate again.
customer_reviews.author: Mimica Blasco

customer_reviews.title: Its an okay drive, I'm a big fan of ...
customer_reviews.text: Its an okay drive, I'm a big fan of the lacie series overall, this is my second rugged drive. I question the thunderbolt speeds. The page says max of 230 MB/s but under a disk test I can get maybe 122mb/s up and down. Its not slow, but its definitely not as fast as advertised. Im using the fastest file system and using thunderbolt.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Orem

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.text: I buy a LOT of these. Rugged and well made. Rock solid and when we are in the field shooting video we need these to assure our footage is safe. Worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Throckmorton

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 1.5 years of light use
customer_reviews.text: Failed after 1.5 years of light use. Typically not even connected to the computer. It is saying it can’t write data and that I should move all data off it. Amazon provides no way to contact the seller and the “support period” ended after only 6 months. This product needs better warranty support.
customer_reviews.author: JeffA

customer_reviews.title: USB 3.0 Cable Disconnects Constantly
customer_reviews.text: The USB 3.0 cable connection is extremely loose so the cable disconnects with the slightest touch. I already returned 1 drive thinking it was defective, now my replacement has the same issue. Considering how the drive is described as being extremely durable, this is a massive oversight. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: danny glover

customer_reviews.title: Rugged AND Smart!
customer_reviews.text: This external hard drive is great. It's rugged and it has TWO TB of memory. I can use it with my new iPad or my laptop. The LaCie came with both cords. I love this thing. It's small, compact, and I can take it with me anywhere and everywhere. I will definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Cisne Grande

customer_reviews.title: Cable is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I thought the drive had crashed on me after about a year of use. I bought a new drive, and a new connection cable just in case it was the cable that was bad. It works again after using the new cable, but something about the whole setup just seems fishy to me now. The cable on my second LaCie Rugged drive burned out after just 1-2 months of use. Not impressed. Probably will not buy LaCie in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Works OK.
customer_reviews.text: While this is advertised as a USB C, that's mostly describing the connector, the drive does not make use of the full data transmission rate advertised by the USB C standard so if you're expecting a very-fast transfer rate you might be disappointed. Seems like decent quality though. Also, you don't need to use the software preloaded on it if you know what you're doing, I just deleted all partitions and started over from scratch using OSX disk utility, worked fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who need portable tech!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Already dropped it once and it survived perfectly. I LOVE the built in Thunderbolt because I do a lot of video work in the field and if you lose the cable, the drive is worthless. Building one in was a great idea. The only change I'd ask for is for the cover to be connected to the unit like the cable. I foresee it getting lost a some point. But overall VERY HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Elnes

customer_reviews.title: Totally reliable in the field for filmmakers
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to drive for media transfer in the field. We have no trouble transferring large 4K RAW files to these drives and have used them for years without any trouble whatsoever. Very reliable and the RAID function means I can even use them as an editing drive for smaller client functions without any hitching. Very pleased with them and always recommend these drives to other filmmakers.
customer_reviews.author: Hospitality Maven

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this HD to attach to my Macbook Pro laptop, and use it to build heavy-duty graphics and website projects. The Macbook has a limited capacity hard-drive, so the LaCie 5TB has been working incredibly well. It has plenty of space, and using the Thunderbolt connection, spins up quickly, as opposed to my compatible USB drives.
customer_reviews.author: carentz

customer_reviews.title: So far it's a trooper
customer_reviews.text: I got this for storing video while editing. It's quick, not too heavy and I have not had any problems with it breaking down or malfunctioning. I like the little case it comes with, as it is just an extra layer of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Kucharski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box it was easy to setup and start to work with. Lacie is one of the best, I have several of these drives for many years without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Pennegan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love how fast this is! I don't know about other drives but this one is supper fast! It back up my entire computer (265 GB) in 17 minutes!!!!!! It also feels supper sturdy, came with multiple cables and a spare cover.
customer_reviews.author: Berenice Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Lacie never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: I have been using lacie branded hard drives for many years since I do a lot of music recording and video editing and I haven't had any problems with any of my hard drives, I love how portable and durable this guys are so if you're looking for a portable drive I would highly recommend this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo Angulo

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Purchased 2 TB LaCie
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 2 TB LaCie because my husband recommended it. He’s a photographer and has used LaCie portable hard drives for years. It was easy to register & I was quickly storing files. It appears to be rugged as described & comes with multiple connection cables. The zippered case with cable storage is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Automatic backup when drive is connected?
customer_reviews.text: Confused if can backup on 2 or more computers/tablets. Did not find manual until after I apparently was successful in backing up PC (had to swap SSDs after PC (financial, stored documents) stopped working and was unable to repair. Fortunately both PCs had a "3 users" edition of Windows 7 Home Premium so there was little trouble to acivating using same product key.
customer_reviews.author: GeneTheMarine

customer_reviews.title: They just WORK!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd set of these LaCie Rugged portable USB hard drives, and they have become an absolutely indispensable part of my workflow. I especially like that they are bus powered so I don't need to carry power brick and such around with me. These things are the bomb, maybe even the bomb-diggity!
customer_reviews.author: Lonny Cruff

customer_reviews.title: Drive failed in less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I've had some success in the past with LaCie rugged drives. I had to buy a larger one, and purchased a 2TB version this past July. It's Dec. 1, less than 6 months after buying it, and it's dead.
customer_reviews.author: G.B. Piranesi

customer_reviews.title: Fast & well built with good travel protection.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do and the case is nice extra protection. The Thunderbolt speed is great. My VMs don't lag like they do with USB3 drives. The drive itself is very well built in an aluminum case and the rubber bumper is just that much more peace of mind for the daily use of a traveling professional.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: My 12th Lacie rugged purchase!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these little drives. This is my 12th purchase for my photography studio, but my first USB-C. Love the added transfer speed. We use them for swap drives for all my associate photographers. They have been dropped and used continually and all going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Photogirl

customer_reviews.title: Good for backup drives
customer_reviews.text: Never had a bad LaCie drive. As advertised, they are rugged. Being only 2TB they are also slim and I like the fact they came with two cables and a case.
customer_reviews.author: bluesy

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects too easily.
customer_reviews.text: Hate that the cord actually comes out quite easily. More than once I have been in the middle of a process and the connection has been dropped due to the weak connection to the drive itself because of the orange covering.
customer_reviews.author: Toni L Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Geniusbar proof!
customer_reviews.text: These rugged drives are very reliable and great for imaging your computer to recover in case of emergency. These things lasted more than a year constant use and frequent drops at the Apple Geniusbar!
customer_reviews.author: C. Willems

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love my lacie drives. Every year I buy a new drive just to keep each years shoots separate. They hold up well, and are great for traveling especially with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah testa

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Product (without Issues)...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely have LOVED the LaCie products ~ have used them over a decade without issue. The rugged models are more durable than others (in my experience) as I am a portable computer user on-the-go all the time. Highly Recommend to everyone if they are looking for a reliable product! I use for Mac and have not had any issues.... :-)
customer_reviews.author: K. S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if its edition but it's mad annoying. I have another Lacie drive I bought 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: For me the benefits of this hard drive seem pointless by this fact: THE CORD CONNECTION IS LOOSE AND DISCONNECTS ALL THE TIME. Its not just my drive, or the cord... I've tried different cords and have 2 of these as does my husband. His drive does exactly the same. I don't know if its edition but it's mad annoying. I have another Lacie drive I bought 5 years ago and it never disconnects.
customer_reviews.author: Mel D. C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing USB Drive
customer_reviews.text: I currently started doing YouTube and I needed a USB to store all my videos. It was a difficult choice for me to make but I ended going with this brand and it was worth every penny. I am using a Mac computer and it works amazing! You do have to set it up but it’s super easy less than 5 minutes to set it up. I would recommend this product to anyone who needs storage for pictures, videos, and/or small clips. I don’t really write reviews for many products but this one is great so I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Elized

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. I have yet to have any problems with ...
customer_reviews.text: We have used these for years at our studio, so far so good. I have yet to have any problems with them. I feel more secure with the Rugged because I know that it can stand up to being taken out of the studio for safe keeping and not get damaged by being in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Channell

customer_reviews.title: Product was good. My particular use is as an external storage ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was good. My particular use is as an external storage source for samples and plugins with Native Instruments Komplete Ultimate. I have a new MBP and I wanted to offload as much data as I could. This is the perfect solution. I have used several incarnations of these before in other solutions and I have always been satisfied with their performance.
customer_reviews.author: Santley88

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The thunderbolt cable is too short really cannot use the drive. Thank
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Gera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Storage
customer_reviews.text: So far has been very durable and it is important as I am hard on products when traveling. No issues with storing and backing up data. Cloud is good but extra backup insurance is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: AWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Good, rugged little drive
customer_reviews.text: Good, rugged little drive. As with any hard drive, you love it until something bad happens. For now, its speedy, comes with a great carrying case, and does what is promises. Will work with both Mac and PC with ExFat formatting.
customer_reviews.author: KRS

customer_reviews.title: 4 TB of storage that is compatible with PC and Mac
customer_reviews.text: I love the Lacie external hard drives. This is my third and I have purchased three as gifts. I love the durability of the Rugged design on this one. Setting it up is a breeze. I use it with my PC and my Mac. Love the 3.0 USB for fast transfer. 4 TB should allow me to keep all of my treasured photos, documents and music safely backed up. Love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: This rating is for the Lacie rugged drive only. The seller shipped the drive and it arrived exactly as specified however, this drive was defective and would not run. I spent an hour on the phone with tech support. Now I have to pay to send it back to Seagate so they will send me a replacement. Not happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: poppa york

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This is essentially a plug and play device that is pleasing to see and easy to use. Very rugged, I dropped it within 30 seconds of taking it from the package.....it worked as if nothing happened! Great buy for storing anything you want!
customer_reviews.author: "esch66"

customer_reviews.title: super fast and rugged
customer_reviews.text: super fast and rugged, annoying to insert the cable into the port on the device feels like i will break it. Also does not always show up on all computers unless you try multiple times and/or try different usb ports on the computer
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product......
customer_reviews.text: LaCie always reliable, this unit is very durable, thick silicone exterior helps keep the rugged look. Easy to set up. Comes with a really nice case. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Chimpo Organics

customer_reviews.title: Fast & Reliable.......
customer_reviews.text: For some time now Apple users have been favouring Western Digital over Seagate Media and LaCie external drives....this is my fourth LaCie Thunderbolt drive and not one of them has let me down yet in the past 4 years since we have been travelling. We use 2 for daily back ups to our MacBook Pro’s and two as off site back ups which we have in case of emergencies. We have no hesitation recommending.
customer_reviews.author: David Wood

customer_reviews.title: Order with caution!
customer_reviews.text: I would order this knowing that it's possible you might get a bad drive. We've bought two of these drives and the one I just got started failing within a month of buying it. It crashed if I try moving big files off of it. It's taken me a couple weeks to get everything off of it just to return it. We're really happy with our other drive, but this was a dud and super frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I like this, and have no problems. I bought this because I have not a bad problem with Lacie.
customer_reviews.author: mtcave55

customer_reviews.title: What can you say - its a Lacie
customer_reviews.text: This is portable HD is an industry standard for those who work in production, filming or for stills. Solid, quality and although a bit pricey its worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Van Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the external hard drive. Came with a protective case and carrying case. Simple to use. No extra steps. Space is as indicated.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Works so far but easier with Apple
customer_reviews.text: It has been really easy to set up for my Mac but different story with my PC and I don't know why. Trying to find time for tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a photographer so I do a lot of storing photos, and this is a key to my process! Tons of space, durable, easy to use, and compact! I love that it comes with a case as well...will buy many more times.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect External Hard Drive Case For Travel
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case. I use it all the time to carry my external hard drive. I'm a brand journalist and am frequently working on assignment away from my office. This case is small yet offers good protection. I can put some business cards and a cable for my external drive in it and then put it in my laptop bag. I'm still careful with my bag because the case offers some protection but if you dropped it, you might ruin your drive.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Failed in two months
customer_reviews.text: Was very slow. Didn’t think too much of it or have time to look into it. After two months it is no longer recognized by computer. The drive never goes anywhere and is just a time machine backup. First time using this brand and it will be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase. This is my third purchase of Lacie Rugged external hard drives DJing needs. Each in larger capacity. All three work perfectly making it easy to maintain trust in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. Large memory to handle my files
customer_reviews.text: I just start using it. I really like it. Large memory to handle my files, easy to use, nicely protected with the cushion around it. I am glad I purchased. It is working well for me.
customer_reviews.author: LDA

customer_reviews.title: small, convenient and duarable.
customer_reviews.text: after purchasing the wrong one I finally got the correct one for my MacBook pro. Just register your drive and make sure you connect it on a stable surface so there's no disconnection while backing up. Bright orange has been helpful so you don't leave it somewhere while traveling! The case is a nice addition too.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Robertson

customer_reviews.title: USB-3 NO NO NO NO NO
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace it because it keeps disconnecting when you slightly touch the cord or move the MacBook. The USB-3 connection sucks.
customer_reviews.author: redswagg

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Super. I have had it for a long time now and no problems. Fast reliable data storage. Like all LaCie products.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina Puffini

customer_reviews.title: will last a lifetime!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great ext. hard drive to back up my laptops, will last a lifetime of uses. If you want the best here is the one to buy. Not only portable but very rugged with the outer case.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: this drive functions as needed and is pretty sturdy feeling in my bag
customer_reviews.text: My problem with this product is that the USB cord is very loose and comes out all the time, as I think I've read in other reviews, due to the rubber case around the drive. Very inconvenient when transferring lots of data. Otherwise, this drive functions as needed and is pretty sturdy feeling in my bag. The case is quite nice as an add on.
customer_reviews.author: HJenny

customer_reviews.title: Difficult Install
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several of these, and each time I have to call for tech support in setting it up. I had expected a plug in and go experience, but this is way more complicated. Wish it were something I could do more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Preparing Heirs

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get enough of Lacie rugged
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love Lacie and the lightening port makes it a cinch.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Durability & reliability
customer_reviews.text: This is my second LaCie Portable Hard Drive. Last one is still working but the connector to my USB broke after many many years of usage. Expect this one to last a long time as well.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: I'm don't know what is the issue with this hard ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm don't know what is the issue with this hard drive. It keeps freezing up and freezing my computer. I have not had this issue with any other external hard drives
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Never worked. Checked with Technicians. They said it is a factory issue. Sad because I know many individuals who have these and I was genuinely excited. Also the customer service was not good.
customer_reviews.author: Alandrea

customer_reviews.title: Poor performer
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good idea, but the performance is so slow ( at 3.2 MB/s Seq Write and Random write of 0.2MB/s) it is nearly unusable. This does not perform at the USB 3.0 sped.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I gave it 4 instead of 5 because for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 instead of 5 because for the same price you could get another external drive that is twice is fast with the same storage space. But I'm still please with the purchase. Reliable and speedy. I use it for school and have had zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Husband grabbed this as we are both into photography and I am an author, it’s great to have everything backed up - easy to use and not too big.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Mini USB
customer_reviews.text: I had to call LaCie to install it because it didn't come with any software or instructions - but once up and running - it has done the job...
customer_reviews.author: Raymac

customer_reviews.title: great hard drive
customer_reviews.text: feels sturdy and high quality. fast transfers. storage case is great. keeps everything nice and secure
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: USB 2.0 Cable Problem
customer_reviews.text: The Hard Drive works well so far (using it for 3 months), but the USB 2.0 cable is a major problem. It does not fit well in my MacBook's USB port. A slight move and the Hard Drive disconnects.
customer_reviews.author: colorsoftrust

customer_reviews.title: Lacie Rugged 2TB External Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: I needed another external drive. My other one is a LaCie, and it's worked very well for me, so when I needed another one to supplement the first, I wanted to stay with LaCie.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie de Juan

customer_reviews.title: keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about an item that has built its reputation on being reliable? Except, keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: wenceslao lopez, jr

customer_reviews.title: Great for New MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: This HD has the protection of the rubber cover nand the transfer rate is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Mizuki

customer_reviews.title: Lacie makes the most reliable external hard drives. This ...
customer_reviews.text: Lacie makes the most reliable external hard drives. This replaces a Passport which I had less than a year. The rugged design is exactly what it means. I also have a lacie thunderbolt which has worked very well. I will stick with Lacie products from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: The storage is excellent and has never let me down
customer_reviews.text: The LaCie Mini has come in handy on more then one occasion. The storage is excellent and has never let me down. Easy setup with my Mac Air!
customer_reviews.author: Harlendd

customer_reviews.title: Photo Storage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this storage device after attending a photography seminar with Mandy Lea in the GSMNP. It gives me a very portable device I can dedicate to my photos. It was easy to use and load and use it on different devices. I am very pleased, and I wouldn't have bought this product with Mandy's advice.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price. So far so good. Gave it 4 stars cause its still trying to encrypt the littlw thing. After having it 3 weeks its at 38%.
customer_reviews.author: Chayil

customer_reviews.title: LaCie external hard drive
customer_reviews.text: Rugged case. seems to work fine so far. Instructions for using a bit vague.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: ... and heavy compared to 2gb disk but it works great
customer_reviews.text: bulky and heavy compared to 2gb disk but it works great
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Lacie Drive
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Lacies rugged drives. Especially like this one due to it supporting the latest USB connection type.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Carver

customer_reviews.title: Still it's a great
customer_reviews.text: a little wider case than others from this product line. Still it's a great product
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Keough

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He uses it every day without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Maaske

customer_reviews.title: Deffective Cord
customer_reviews.text: The cord that was provided with my order is defective and constantly comes out at the slightest bump or movement. I am not impressed with the quality of the cord that was provided. It makes it virtually impossible to use unless I am sitting at a table. Constantly my drive keeps disconnecting from my computer due to a poor connection.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany G

customer_reviews.title: Good product...with form and function
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done...love the rubberized protection and the traveling case that came with it
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Portable and rugged , easy to use. Dissappointed that I could not just hook it up to my camera and download the photos from it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Fast. No problem with the connection cable thus far.

customer_reviews.title: We have used this for years. Never had trouble ...
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for years. Never had trouble. Traveled with it and never had issues with the bumps and bounces of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: What you expect
customer_reviews.text: Lacie is what you expect. Great stuff from a trusted brand. I need to put more words to submit this.
customer_reviews.author: AJR

customer_reviews.title: Super portable
customer_reviews.text: Great portable hard drive. Light weight and easy to use. You just need to plug it in and viola!

customer_reviews.title: Best External Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Product ! The very best for a rugged hard drive ! I've dropped them from over 3 ft on a hard floor and it keeps on going strong ! I couldn't be happier !
customer_reviews.author: Cigar Doc

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMENDED BY IT EXPERT
customer_reviews.text: When I left my job to freelance, this is the external drive the IT guy at my former company recommended I buy to go with my MacBook Pro.
customer_reviews.author: JSakson

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Terrible packaging from supplier
customer_reviews.text: Excellent drive, have used many and always reliable However package damaged from Calumet, was in a flimsy plastic bag mailer with a tattered area that looked as if it had been bashed / dragged. troubling as means I can not feel drive is 100% reliable
customer_reviews.author: billybibliotech

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked ok for a few months it froze up occasionally but now the USB simply will not connect properly. This unit has never been dropped or mishandled in any way. Years of work is on it that I absolutely need!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the ease in which the different cores can be ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and have it formatted. I love the ease in which the different cores can be selected and sized. I see this in my bag and at home for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Lacie Rugged 2TB External Portable Hard Drive - USB 3.0, USB-C – STFR2000800 /STFR2000400 - with Ivation Compact Portable Hard Drive Case (Small)
product_meta.description:
Size:2TB| Style:USB-C| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThis drive marries legendary Rugged durability with a cutting-edge USB-C port for compatibility with next-generation computers like the latest Apple Macbook. Beyond being rain, drop, and crush resistant, the LaCie Rugged USB-C is also backwards compatible with USB 3.0 and USB 2.0.

Featuring the market’s highest storage capacity for its size, the LaCie Rugged USB-C gives you enough space to store your digital present— and future. Massive capacity lets you use the LaCie Rugged as a shuttle drive to transport footage from set to post-production or to store a huge Lightroom library.

Creative pros have been depending on LaCie Rugged drives for over a decade because they are the most reliable way to transport and capture data in the field. With resistance to drops, crush, rain and unauthorized access, the LaCie Rugged USB-C is tough enough for extreme conditions—from a sudden rainstorm to a crush of suitcases in an airplane cargo hold.

Armor for Your Data 
♦ Drop resistance: 4-ft (1.2m)1 
♦ Crush resistance: 1-ton car2 
♦ Water resistance: rain 
♦ Unauthorized access resistance: encryption available 
♦ 2-year limited warranty 

Ivation Compact Portable Hard Drive Case (Small) 
♦ Compact case to store or transport small hard drives, Interior strap secures portable hard drive in place
♦ Durable, hard shell exterior will protect you valuable data, Inside mesh pocket allows storage of cables
♦ Slim design allows case to easily fit into any backpack or larger case
♦ Inside dimensions: 5.51" x 3.93" x 1.18"
♦ Outside dimensions: 6.10" x 4.52"x 1.57"

Included in this Calumet Bundle: 
♦ 1) LaCie Rugged Rugged USB-C 2TB (STFR2000400) 
♦ 2) Ivation Compact Portable Hard Drive Case (Small)
feature_bullets: New USB-C connector for next-generation computers
Included USB 3.0 adapter works with PC or Mac
Drop-, crush- and rain-resistant for all-terrain use
CALUMET BUNDLE INCLUDES 2 ITEMS -- ALL BRAND NEW ITEMS WITH ALL MANUFACTURER-SUPPLIED ACCESSORIES + FULL USA WARRANTIES
